articles.title: VSCode Extension for RuyiSDK
articles.summary: The RuyiSDK VSCode extension plugin version 0.1.0 has been officially released. Give it a try now!

articles.title: Great News: Steam Can Now Run Stably on RISC-V! Box64 Delivers Again
articles.summary: Box64 version v0.3.8 has been released. This update brings a large number of compatibility fixes to the RISC-V backend, making Linux Steam (finally) able to run stably!

articles.title: The First "Hefei RISC-V Open Day" Held at Hefei University of Technology, Showcasing a Vibrant Ecosystem
articles.summary: On September 24, 2025, the first Hefei RISC-V Open Day was successfully held at Hefei University of Technology. The event brought together over a hundred experts and scholars to discuss the developmen...

articles.title: Put Learning into Practice — XuanTie RV Academy Courses Launched; Join Us to Build the Future of Chips
